盋字的基本解释

盋
bō
古同“钵”。

盋字的汉语字典释义

[①]［bō］
［《廣韻》北末切，入末，幫。］
亦作“盋1”。“钵1”的繁体字。亦作“缽1”。
(1)梵语钵多罗（pātra）的省称。意为“應器”。僧人食具。底平，口略小，形圆稍扁。用泥或铁等制成。
(2)盛器。形似盆而小，用来盛饭、菜、茶水等。
(3)指衣钵。前人传下来的思想、学术、技能等。

盋字的康熙字典解释

【午集中】【皿字部】　盋； 康熙笔画：10； 页码：页793第22
【唐韻】【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】?北末切，音撥。【說文】盋，食器也。盂屬。【程大昌·演繁露】盂，食器。若盋而大，今之所謂盋盂也。　【唐韻】同鉢。【六書正譌】从皿犮聲。別作鉢，非。

盋字的源字形

Basic explanation of words
盋
bō
The ancient same "bo".
盋
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［bō］
["Guangyun" cut at the north end, enter the end, help. ]
Also known as "盋1". Traditional characters for "bo 1". Also known as "Bowl 1".
(1) The provincial name of Pātra in Sanskrit. It means "single device". Food utensils for monks. The bottom is flat, the mouth is slightly smaller, and the shape is round and slightly flat. Made of mud or iron.
(2) Container. It looks like a basin and is small, used to hold rice, vegetables, tea, etc.
(3) Refers to the mantle. Thoughts, academics, skills, etc. handed down from predecessors.
盋
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Afternoon Concentration] [Min Zi Department] 　盋; Kangxi Strokes: 10; Page Number: Page 793 22
[Tang Yun] [Ji Yun] [Rhyme Meeting] [Zheng Yun]? North end cut, tone dial. [Said the text] 盋, food utensils also. Genus. [Cheng Dachang·Yan Fanlu] A bowl, a food container. If squat and big, the so-called squat is also today.　【Tang Yun】The same bowl. 【Liushu Zhengzheng】Cong Sanxuan sound. Don't be a bowl, no.
